title: OCE 10 Ban System LIve !!!!!
body:
Wooo !!!

Finally the new 10 ban system. 

I love how you don't need to ask your teammates to ban someone OP and risk them not listening. 

Good Job Riot !! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: The only problem is that bans can be duplicated, so it's not really 10 ban. Most of the time it's a 6-8 ban system, which kinda suck. But oh well.
Never again shall I have to fight a Lee Sin!
Zacs ban rate has gone from 18% to 50% in a day. LOL

logging in to say that i absolutely LOVE this change!

GREAT WORK RIOT!!
